title: Godfrey Uzoigwe Imperialism in Africa Q3

content.question: Increasing interest among historians about the topic analyzed in the passage could best be explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The decolonization of Africa in the second half of the twentieth century
The reduction of tensions between the United States and the Soviet Union
The increasing economic globalization resulting from new transportation and communication technologies
The increasing migration of Africans and other formerly colonized people to Europe

content.answer: The decolonization of Africa in the second half of the twentieth century

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
